content:
the Ithaca College wrestling team took home the team title at the Spartan Invitational Saturday at York College of Pennsylvania in York Pennsylvania PERIOD

The invitational was loaded with talented wrestlers featuring nine teams ranked in the National Wrestling Coaches Association Division III poll PERIOD

A score of . from the Bombers were good enough for a first place finish in a field of  teams PERIOD Roger Williams University was the runner up with . points PERIOD Rounding out the top five were Johnson  Wales University with  points Williams College with . points and The College of New Jersey with . points PERIOD

The Bombers who came into this contest ranked thirteenth in the latest national poll were led by strong performances from a pair of sophomores Bryan Israel and Nick Velez who each captured individual titles in their respective weight classes PERIOD

Junior Captain Jimmy Kaishian at  lb and senior Dan Pak at  lb each placed third in their respective weight classes PERIOD

The Blue and Gold will look to win their third straight dual when the Bombers visit Rochester Institute of Technology for their next match Dec PERIOD  in Rochester New York PERIOD The Tigers comes into the match with an overall record of  PERIOD

Your donation will support The Ithacans student journalists in their effort to keep the Ithaca College and wider Ithaca community informed PERIOD Your contribution will allow us to purchase equipment and cover our annual website hosting costs PERIOD

The Student News Site of Ithaca College
title: Wrestling squad earns team title at Spartan Invitational - The Ithacan
name: Ithaca College
